spells.description: Use: Gain 4,232 Parry and 3,009 Avoidance for 6 sec, after which you emit a shockwave in front of you that deals 68,078 Physical damage. (30 Sec Cooldown)

spells.description:
Use: Become Mudborne, absorbing 8.3 million damage and pulsing 342,331 Nature damage split between nearby enemies over 10 sec.

Periodic damage you take coalesces into pungent mud to feed the ritual, reducing this cooldown by 2.0 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,241 Strength. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 69,717 Nature damage over 8 sec.
